title: Soukou Kihei Votoms: Genei-hen
alternative_title: Armored Trooper Votoms: Phantom Arc, 装甲騎兵ボトムズ 幻影篇
description: For their silver anniversary, Vanilla and Coconna return to Uoodo along with Gotho in the hopes of reuniting with Chirico. Once there they find a red shouldered AT at the Battling arena.
